data.name: Raging Fists: Retribution
data.detailed_description:
Raging Fists: Retribution is Action Fighting Game based in a sci-fi industrial era. it combines Asian style fighting with sci-fi like scenery. This mashup of style, is complimented with pvp online play. battle other players online for an action packed adventure. Play story mode to learn about each character. train to be the best fighter in the training room! battle a cpu, or battle your friend locally. Controller support included.

Are you ready to fight?
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Raging Fists: Retribution is an Action Fighting Game based in a sci-fi industrial era.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher/ AMD ryzen 3 or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or higher/AMD RX 450 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Requires A Modern Proccessor and a GPU with Shader Model 5 Support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher/ AMD ryzen 3 or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 ti or higher/AMD rx550 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Requires A Modern Proccessor and a GPU with Shader Model 5 Support
